exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: The exercise that involves the use of a barbell (iron bar) is typically performed on a flat bench.
exercises.preparation:
1. Prepare the bench and load the barbell.
2. Lie flat on the bench with your feet on the floor.
3. Grip the barbell and lift it from the neck.

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: Similar to the flat bench press, but performed on an incline bench to target the upper chest muscles.
exercises.preparation:
1. Set the bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
2. Lie back and grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width.
3. Lift the bar and lower it slowly to your upper chest.

exercises.name: Pull Ups
exercises.description: A compound upper-body exercise that targets the back muscles, particularly the latissimus dorsi.
exercises.preparation:
1. Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip.
2. Hang with your arms fully extended.
3. Pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
